meanings.definition: Consisting of or resembling an armillary sphere.
meanings.sent1: The armillary design on the necklace was intricate.
meanings.sent2: The armillary pattern on the fabric looked elegant.
meanings.sent3: The armillary decorations at the party were eye-catching.
meanings.sent4: Her armillary hairstyle was unique and stylish.
meanings.sent5: The armillary artwork on the wall was mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: A spherical model of the celestial globe.
meanings.sent1: The armillary in the museum displayed the stars beautifully.
meanings.sent2: He studied the armillary to learn about the constellations.
meanings.sent3: The armillary rolled off the table and onto the floor.
meanings.sent4: She gazed at the armillary, imagining herself among the stars.
meanings.sent5: The armillary's intricate details made it a fascinating piece of art.
